about_the_game:
There are many useful items in the Light-bearing judge set that will improve your game. This set will allow you to enjoy the possibilities that the store offers. You will have a large amount of supplies at your disposal, as well as quantity!

Please note that all items from the general experience set cannot be stored in a warehouse and cannot be transferred to another player.

Remember that you can only buy the Light-bearing judge set once.

The package includes:

Potion of experience (24 hours) [NP] (1 piece)
Potion of experience (4 hours) [NP] (1 piece)
Potion of experience (1 hour) [NP] (1 piece)
Craftsman's Experience Potion (1 day) [NP] (1 piece)
Wealth Potion [NP] (5 pieces)
Craftsman's Potion (1 day) [NP] (1 piece)
7 days of premium account [NP] (1 piece)
The Wanderer (1 piece)
Mechanical Spider Summoning Whistle (1 piece)

You can get the purchased set in the "Gifts" menu of the in-game store.

name: Sphere 3 - Light-bearing judge
short_description: Light-bearing judge contains useful items that will enhance your gameplay.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
